resources.string:
Hi, I'm Nurlan, 

 I'm a developer, 

 I'm learning native Android programming with Kotlin, 
 I'm using Google's course to broaden my skill on Android Programming. 

 I've experience over bunch of programming languages like Python, JS, C++, C# and etc.

 I'm looking forward to learn and realize my ideas.
 Thanks for reading.
